definition: to seek truth from facts (idiom)/to be practical and realistic
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: “He can eat it when he comes in to the classroom, ” she said, very matter-of-factly.
sentences.chinese: “他可以進了教室再喫，”老師實事求是地說道。

sentences.english: Naturally measurements are only one part of the subwoofer evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 實事求是的說，測量參數也只是低音炮評估的一部分。

sentences.english: I honestly cannot think of any other variable that might be correlated with childhood intelligence than those already controlled for in the multiple regression analyses.
sentences.chinese: 實事求是的說，我個人無法想到任何其他的控制變量。

sentences.english: Being practical and realistic is the principle of using Li to explain the Book of Songs.
sentences.chinese: 以禮說《詩》應該遵循實事求是原則。

sentences.english: Unmentioned matters shall be addressed by both Parties through consultation with each other on the principle of seeking truth from facts.
sentences.chinese: 本合同未盡事項由雙方本着實事求是的原則協商解決。

sentences.english: They had to give a sober assessment of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他們必須對情況做個實事求是的估量。

sentences.english: Article 47 The petition or complaint made by a public procurator shall be true to facts.
sentences.chinese: 第四十七條檢察官提出申訴和控告，應當實事求是。

sentences.english: As far as I know, none of their factual assertions have been refuted.
sentences.chinese: 就我所知，他們實事求是的言論沒有一條被人反駁。

sentences.english: "Facts" are information, "Yes" is the ultimate decision-making, "seeking" through information analysis, decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 信息運用於決策的過程就是“實事求是”的過程。

sentences.english: And the spirit pierce through Dai Zhen"s philosophy is "Seekingtruth from facts".
sentences.chinese: 貫穿在戴震哲學中的精神是“實事求是”的精神。

sentences.english: She was truthful, open-hearted and cheerful.
sentences.chinese: 她實事求是，心胸開闊，快活。

sentences.english: The Egoodh element of Taurus can raise strength properly desire for solid ground form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座願望並具有實事求是的能力。

sentences.english: We have to be realistic about our chances of wining .
sentences.chinese: 對於我們獲勝的可能性，我們要實事求是。

sentences.english: Second, persevering in emancipating the mind, seeking truth from facts and keeping up with the times.
sentences.chinese: 第二，堅持解放思想，實事求是，與時俱進。

sentences.english: Such pragmatic thinking lacks the sizzle and punch of get-rich-quick advice.
sentences.chinese: 這種實事求是的思想是不會告訴你如何賺快錢的。

sentences.english: You are absolutely right. Finally, I think we need to be critiqued in writing a resume.
sentences.chinese: 意思是實事求是的，這也是必不可少的要求。
